attributes.action: Support the use of high frequency disincentive devices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
High frequency noise devices used to 'annoy' youths pose NO harm to the hearing of humans OR animals due to their low volume.

The effect of such devices is NOT immediate, but becomes annoying over a period of 5 - 15 minutes.

The devices are only used when the human rights of one group of people are being infringed by another group of people.

Such devices are completely benign and require NO confrontation between youths and business owners or youths and police.

Such devices are merely a gentle nudge to move along please.
